resources.string: Please Enter to the required section below to determine the maximum load capacity of the dumper car\'s carriage. And the maximum theta the carriage can be lifted carrying the mass of the given material.
The graph is plotted dynamically from the user different inputs and number of calculations. The X-axis is for the LOAD in Kg and the Y-axis is for the VOLUME.

The answer is calculated using your inputs from the main page. Note that the maximum lift force capacity of the dumper car standard is 686,700 N. And the standard load capacity of most newer dumper cars is 70 Ton. Therefore depending on the dencity of the load the maximum load mass should not be greater than 70,000 Kg.
 
 In addition, the volume of the material might be higher than the dumpers capacity but should but the mass should not get higher than this the force of the car's capacity which is reacted to lift the weight. 
 
 For more information please email to : adu.kidus@yahoo.com

The app is made to ease the works of dumper car owners and other study disciplines concerned with the carriage of the dumper car as well as assist students verify the calculations they encounter for such related questions.

 The app has also a computer software for using it on your desktops too. Therefore please check our site and feel free to comment and give us your feed back as it helps us on improving the app for your better experience.
